actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the United States not admit more than six hundred and fifty thousand immigrants in fiscal year 1980.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the United States not admit more than 650,000 immigrants, including refugees, in fiscal year 1980, and that the President shall submit to the Congress an annual U.S. immigration goal.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the United States not admit more than six hundred and fifty thousand immigrants in fiscal year 1980.
